keysForContent.name: Name
keysForContent.congratulations: Congratulations! Your Grameen Unnati Loan has been disbursed.
keysForContent.letter1: At CreditAccess Grameen Limited (CA Grameen), we strive towards enabling widespread economic and social change with our diverse financial products and services. We hope your decision to partner with CA Grameen helps you to progress on to your next milestone in life.
keysForContent.letter2: Key document(s) relating to your account are enclosed with this letter.
keysForContent.letter3: For easy reference, please find below the details of your Grameen Unnati Loan :
keysForContent.letter4: Your loan has been disbursed in accordance with the terms and conditions of the sanction letter, loan agreement and other document executed between you and CA Grameen. We hope you find that your account details are accurate. Should you have any queries or concerns, please do contact us on our Toll Free Number 1800- 123- 153-153 during working hours or email us at customersupport@grameenkoota.in. In all communication, please remember to quote your loan ID and customer ID, both of which are mentioned at the top of this letter. If you are not satisfied with the resolution provided by us, you will have the option of escalating it to AKMI toll free number (for customers in Karnataka) at 1800-425-5654 or MFIN toll free number (for other state customers) at 1800-2700-317. At CA Grameen, we treasure every client relationship and look forward to a long fruitful association with you.
